verbs.description: [ARG0: Google] [V: confirmed] [ARG2: to Business Insider] [ARG1: that interest in Markle in the US overtook that in Trump on Thursday morning , amid a maelstrom of drama surrounding the royal wedding] .
Google confirmed to Business Insider that interest in Markle in the US overtook that in Trump on Thursday morning , amid a maelstrom of [ARG1: drama] [V: surrounding] [ARG2: the royal wedding] .
